unnormalised: Arrey yaar, my train is delayed by 2 hrs already! Supposed to reach Kanpur at 6:00 AM but looks like I'll be seeing the sunrise from the platform on 25/12/2024.
normalised: Arrey yaar, my train is delayed by two hours already! Supposed to reach Kanpur at six A-M but looks like I'll be seeing the sunrise from the platform on twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty four.
